name: Rosemary
properties: Contains compounds that may support cognitive function
benefits: Rosemary is a potent anti-inflammatory herb rich in antioxidants. It's traditionally used in Mediterranean cooking, especially with beans, vegetables, and tomato-based dishes. Rosemary contains rosmarinic acid and other compounds with potential neuroprotective and anti-inflammatory benefits.
amount: 1 sprig fresh rosemary per pot of soup or stew, or 1/2 to 1 teaspoon dried

quotes: 1 sprig rosemary - Ribollita with White Beans and Cavolo Nero (page 47)
